card_name: Kirsa Perle, the Sword of Perle
rules_text:
Kirsa Perle has first strike as long as she is attacking.
When Kirsa Perle enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 blue Scout creature token. If she escaped, create three of those tokens instead.
Escape {3}{R}{W}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)[/i]
